name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Edwin Armondo Reyes AYALA, Appellee

judges: Before CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, BAER, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Edwin Armondo Reyes AYALA, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of August, 2004, the order of the Lancaster County Court of Common Pleas is reversed insofar as it declared the Registration of Sexual Offenders Act unconstitutional, and the case is remanded for further proceedings. See Commonwealth v. Williams, 574 Pa. 487, 832 A.2d 962 (2003); Commonwealth v. Maldonado, 576 Pa. 101, 838 A.2d 710 (2003).
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Janna Rae Steinruck, for Com. of Pa.
James Arthur Gratton, Ronks, James Jude Karl, for Edwin Armondo Reyes Ayala.
casebody.head_matter:
855 A.2d 762
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Edwin Armondo Reyes AYALA, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 13, 2004.
Decided Aug. 18, 2004.
Janna Rae Steinruck, for Com. of Pa.
James Arthur Gratton, Ronks, James Jude Karl, for Edwin Armondo Reyes Ayala.
Before CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, BAER, JJ.
